full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 72 of 236 976 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross house? Your answer was: I was. And then the next question is: All right. Who was your direct supervisor? You said: Mr. Epstein. He would deal with me directly or, if he was not available, Ms. Maxwell. Do you see that? A. Yes. Q. Those were the questions and answers under oath that you gave, correct? A. Could have been, yes. Q. Are you denying it, Mr. Alessi? A. I am not denying it. Q. Okay. And then at line 18 of the same transcript -- THE COURT: Just a moment. (Pause) THE COURT: Okay. BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. You answered: But if Mr. Epstein was at the house, I would never go to Ms. Maxwell, I would go to him directly or he would come to me. Do you see that, Mr. Alessi? A. Yes, sir. Q. And that was your testimony under oath about who the boss SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018173
